content: skyscraper windows hat by babs ausherman i ve been having so much fun with this stitch pattern that i couldn t resist making a hat to match my cowls for the sample hat i paired a strongly variegated contrast color with a nicely contrasting solid and i love how each window turned out diff erent just like the inside of every window in a high rise would give you a view into a diff erent
